CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Rating3__c , 'Strongly agree - Blue') , 4, IF(ISPICKVAL( Rating3__c, 'Agree - Green'), 3, IF(ISPICKVAL( Rating3__c , 'Somewhat disagree -Yellow'), 2, IF(ISPICKVAL( Rating3__c , 'Strongly disagree –Red'), 1, IF(ISPICKVAL( Rating3__c , 'No opinion – White'),0,null)))))
CustomField.label: Score
